commitResults.messageTitle: Change chatbot name from Duke to Echo
Change class name from Duke to Echo

commitResults.messageBody:
The chatbot is currently only displaying a welcome to Duke message.

Let’s add a greeting message that introduces Echo and interact with the users.

This change ensures that the chatbot starts with a friendly greeting. The greeting messages are designed to create a cool and interactive experience.

The chatbot is currently only displaying a greeting message from Echo

Let’s add an exit message that bids farewell for Echo to the users.

This change ensures that the chatbot ends with a friendly farewell. The exit messages are designed to create a cool and interactive experience.

commitResults.messageTitle: Import Scanner class and create an object to handle user input
Declare user input from the scanner object
Add do-while loop until user says bye
commitResults.messageBody:
The chatbot only shows a welcome message.

Let's add a do-while loop which ensures that the chatbot echoes the user's input repeatedly and only exits when the user types bye.

This makes Echo more interactive with the user.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug when user input is bye
commitResults.messageBody:
Echo repeats bye when user input is bye.

Let's add a if statement so that bye will not be reapted when user inputs it.

This ensures that the interface matches the task given.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add a line between bye and the exit message
Create constructor for TaskList class to initialise variables for task storage
Create method for storage of new tasks by user
Update Echo class to store new tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Echo repeats when user inserts task.

Let's add the word added in front and store task in an array.

This ensures that the task is added properly to the tasks array.

commitResults.messageTitle: Create method for displaying of tasks stored

Update Echo class to list all the tasks >> >> Echo is unable to display all tasks. >> >> Let's add functionality to make sure echo displays the tasks when asked to list. >> >> This ensures that the user will know what task is left to be done.
Fix bug in storeTask method to allow proper chronological display of tasks
